participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Practical and family-oriented, he values simplicity and utility over modern excess.
participant_1.background: i have three children. i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.name: Eleanor
participant_2.personality: Vivacious and reflective, she embraces life with a youthful spirit and enjoys reminiscing about the past.
participant_2.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old.

content.text: i am 100 years old but i feel like i might live forever
I'm amazed of how many useless technics are around just for money and not for peoples usefullnes
i remember when nobody had a television and now there are alot of different televisions without and difference between them
